steps.title: Welcome to Chef in Your Pocket!
steps.description: Your personal AI chef. Let's quickly show you around.

steps.title: Craft Your Dish
steps.description: Start by entering ingredients you have, choose a cuisine, and even specify allergies. Our AI will create a unique recipe just for you.

steps.title: Plan a Full Menu
steps.description: Have a special occasion? Switch to 'Menu Planner' mode, describe the event, and get a complete 3-course menu with recipes and photos!

steps.title: Scan Your Fridge
steps.description: Don't want to type? Use the camera icon to scan your ingredients, and we'll identify them for you instantly.

steps.title: Interact & Customize
steps.description: Use the 'Chef's Touch' to modify recipes, find ingredient substitutes with the magic wand, and enter the 'Cook with Me' mode for a step-by-step interactive guide.

steps.title: You're All Set!
steps.description: Save your favorite creations and manage your shopping list. Enjoy your culinary adventure!
